comprehensive_overview: MVAPICH2-GDR is a high-performance MPI library designed for NVIDIA GPU Direct RDMA technology, allowing direct data transfers between GPUs and networking adapters without involving the CPU. It is optimized for HPC clusters and large-scale computing environments to achieve low latency and high message rate communication.
core_features: Optimized for NVIDIA GPU Direct RDMA technology
Designed for HPC clusters and large-scale computing environments
Low latency and high message rate communication
